creator: Public Media Apps
descriptionHtml:
Maine Public:

The maine public app allows you to watch and listen to maine public programming, from radio, TV and online. The app provides on-demand content for your favorite Maine Public Radio, Maine Public Television, NPR & PBS shows, live streaming of the Maine Public Radio & Maine Public Classical channels, PBS Kids! content with parental controls, easy access to the Radio and TV program schedule plus much more!
Live Streaming
• DVR-like controls (pause, rewind, and fast forward). You can pause the live stream to have a conversation and pick up right where you left off! Or rewind to catch a comment you just missed.
• Listen to live streams from Maine Public Broadcasting even while traveling! Start the app and your favorite station starts playing – no clicks to start listening.
• Integrated program schedules for Maine Public Radio and Maine Public Television content
• Listen to Maine Public Radio or Maine Public Classical in the background while browsing the web or catching up on your emails!

On Demand
• Easy access to recent and past Maine Public Radio and Maine Public Television programs.
• DVR-like controls. Pause, rewind and fast forward your program with ease.
• When listening and watching programs, individual segments (when available) are listed so you can review and choose one, or enjoy the entire program.
• The maine public app displays the web page associated with the program or program segment you are listening to enabling you to dive deeper into the content.

Additional features
• Schedule reminders to alert you when your favorite programs air.
• Easily share stories and programs with family and friends.

The maine public app is brought to you by the maine public and Public Media Apps. We work to provide our valued members, listeners and viewers with great solutions to access the content you want...anytime…Anywhere.

Please support maine public by becoming a member today!


http://mainepublic.org
http://www.publicmediaapps.com

• When listening and watching programs, individual segments (when available) are listed so you can review and choose one, or enjoy the entire program.
• The maine public app displays the web page associated with the program or program segment you are listening to enabling you to dive deeper into the content.

Additional features
• Schedule reminders to alert you when your favorite programs air.
• Easily share stories and programs with family and friends.

The maine public app is brought to you by the maine public and Public Media Apps. We work to provide our valued members, listeners and viewers with great solutions to access the content you want...anytime…Anywhere.

Please support maine public by becoming a member today!


http://mainepublic.org
http://www.publicmediaapps.com
descriptionShort: With the MPBN App you can watch and listen to MPBN programming from radio and TV

Performance enhancements and bug fixes.
Your feedback helps us make our app better for everyone. Please send us your suggestions via the "Settings and Help" section of the app!
